description: League tables showing how bus operators compare against each other

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Our league tables will help bus operators measure their performance against other operators."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}

Our league tables show how our operators have been performing against a number of measures. There's also a network average for further comparisons. They are distributed internally, as well as to operators.
The reports give operators the data to measure performance against their own track record and that of other bus companies.
Data comes from electronic systems that hold bus mileage by day and route and also from our quality service indicator (QSI) results .
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"High frequency - excess waiting time"}

Routes with five or more buses scheduled every hour are called 'high
        frequency' routes. The table below shows how long passengers have to
        wait for a bus above the average scheduled waiting time. This is based
        on how performance varies from minimum standards.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"High Frequency Day Routes: Excess Waiting Time - Q3 2019-20","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/2019-20-q3-ewt-day.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 32KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"High frequency - long gaps"}

This table shows the likelihood of waiting twice the scheduled interval
        between buses. This is based on how performance varies from minimum
        standards.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"High Frequency Day Routes: Long Gaps occurring in service - Q3 2019-20","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/2019-20-q3-lg-day.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 32KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"High frequency night buses - excess waiting time"}
The table below shows how long passengers have to wait for a bus above the average scheduled waiting time. This is based on how performance varies from minimum standards.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"High Frequency Night Routes: Excess Waiting Time - Q3 2019-20","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/2019-20-q3-ewt-night.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 28KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Low frequency - on time"}

Routes with up to four buses an hour are called 'low frequency'. This
        table shows the likelihood of a bus arriving on time, based on how
        performance varies from minimum standards.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Low Frequency Day Routes: departing On Time - Q3 2019-20","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/2019-20-q3-ot-day.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 33KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Low frequency - early"}
This table shows the likelihood of a bus running early, based on how performance varies from minimum standards.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Low Frequency Day Routes: departing Early - Q3 2019-20","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/2019-20-q3-early-day.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 32KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Night buses - on time"}
This table shows the likelihood of a night bus arriving on time.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Low Frequency Night Routes: departing On Time - Q3 2019-20","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/2019-20-q3-ot-night.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 32KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Mileage before losses due to traffic delays"}
This table shows the amount of mileage operated against a schedule, before taking into account mileage lost due to traffic.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Mileage operated before Traffic and Other Non-deductible Losses - Q3 2019-20","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/2019-20-q3-mileage-op-before-nd.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 33KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Actual mileage operated"}
This table shows the amount of mileage operated against a schedule, taking into account all losses.

{"template":"listgroup","style":"nocard","links":[{"title":"Mileage operated - Q3 2019-20","url":"/cdn/static/cms/documents/2019-20-q3-mileage-operated.pdf","icon":"download","size":"PDF 33KB","image":{}}],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
{"template":"htag","level":"h3","value":"Mileage lost due to traffic delays"}
This table shows the amount of mileage lost due to traffic.
